Event.name: Post_receiving
Event.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs immediately after the <fen>Recipient</fen> has come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> offered by the <fen>Donor</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who has just acted to come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who has just given the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that changes possession, beginning in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen> and ending up with the <fen>Recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Post_giving event occurs. </def-root>
